name: POV Spitroast Fuck + Creampie LoRA
description:
A LoRA for creating POV spitroast (threesome) images from the rear point of view. You can find the Blowjob POV version here.

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

I tried to do do a version that can do both, the blowjob POV and this one, but it didn't turn out great. Maybe I'll take another look in the future but for now you can enjoy this one instead.

It tends to generate two men in the background sometimes, but let's consider that a feature ;)

I added 'anal' and 'vaginal' to the tags as well because it was trained on those, but didn't have much luck with prompting them. Maybe you can do better.

Recommended strength is around 0.7.

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge

If you like this, you may also like my other LoRAs.
